column5: Well yet another long weekend has come and gone..Sorry for the late report but I have been busy paying for my holiday this week. We were down to the Trent 2 weeks ago for some pike action. For those of you that read the report see the pics. For those of you that didn't here is the highlight of the weekend  Anyway on to this long weekend past. We went to the Trent with Friends and family! We had a blast. It didn't seem to matter where we fished either they were on Baby   . Drifting the fast water to 30 feet of water.. They were there and hungry! The fishing was so good we decided to go try the Hastings Dam Sat night..It was shoulder to shoulder with crossing lines city...The mosquitos were so thick we were out of there in a mere 20 minutes. .In total we managed 15 fish and kept 9. 5 of them were 19 inches! Either the fish gods were good to us of there is a TON of slot fish this year. I have to admit there is nothing nicer then seeing your 10 year old daughter reel in a 19 inch walleye in some of the toughest, roughest,fast moving snag city water. I'm a proud Daddy to say the least  Anyway Ill let the pics od the rest of the talking. Thanks for reading folks!!  HookNlip and his boys!!     Notice my lucky little girl's "lucky fishing hat"?  What a beautiful sight!
Looks like a great weekend Ron - great pics of the kids and looks like you got a  walleye fest to boot Did ya get a length on that Gator? Thanks for the report!
nice eyes
looks like you have those walleye dialed in
Ya Rick it was a 36 inch Gator. Hey does anyone know how to edit the title of my post...I have 2 spelling errors ...DOH!
I think it was the shirt you're wearing in pic #3 . Fish just love a winner (you should have an EDIT button when you click on your post to correct the beerslips)
Lol awesome, I didnt even notice the shirt..Good eye Rick! Your they do like winners!!
I was in Campbellford on Wed and Thurs. Never been in that area before. I was surprised not to see anyone fishing.
Awesume report nice to see you had a good weekend Nice fish.  Ruba dub dub rub it in
Some GREAT memories made there !!! Thanks for sharing!
Those walleye look tasty. Good fishin !
Good stuff, Ron!  Some nice eater size gold
Perfect!  Great report Ron.
Nice shootin Ron!!! ...It was nice of your daughter to let you have your pic taken with her fish...  Cheers to ya ALL!
looks like it was fun
Great report & nice to see the kids were involved SBK
Nice report looks like the family had a great time congrats
A big thanks to all for the nice comments
Good Work out there bud - and no worries on the late-ness... you beat me to it! haha  cheers, Ryan
Nice bunch of walleyes and the little ones look happy, perfect trip.
Thanks for sharing your weekend! Looks like a great trip. Good job Dad, I feel you pride!!
